keywords.value: Disney, Walt, World (Lake Buena Vista, Fla)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The company is recalling about 10,000 Darth Vader and Disneyland 60th-anniversary infant onesies because the snaps can detach and pose a choking hazard.

headline.print_headline: Walt Disney Parks and Resorts Recalls 10,000 Infant Onesies
headline.main: Walt Disney Parks and Resorts Recalls 10,000 Infant Onesies

snippet: The company is recalling about 10,000 Darth Vader and Disneyland 60th-anniversary infant onesies because the snaps can detach and pose a choking hazard.
abstract: Walt Disney Parks and Resorts is recalling 10,000 Darth Vader and Disneyland 60th-anniversary infant onesies after finding that snaps can detach and pose choking hazard.
